name: classic
description: Score as many points as possible within a certain timeframe
details: The objective of the game is to score as many points as possible before the time runs out.
The duration of the game is outlined at the start of the game.
There is no time-limit to each move made.

name: timed-move
description: Under time pressure to make a move within a certain timeframe, try to score as much as possible in a given game
details: You need to place the letter on the board before a timer reaches zero.
The time to make a move can be as long as 10+ seconds and as short as 1 second!
If you cannot make a move in the given time, a tile will be removed from the board.
The objective is to score as many points as possible in a given game time duration.

name: scavenger-hunt
description: A list of challenges is given and the goal is to complete as many of them as possible within a given timeframe.
details: A set of challenging items is given at the start of the game
Examples: 'cross two 5 letter words', 'find 3 words in one turn', 'get a 4 turn point streak', 'make an anagram' ...
Items can be achieved in any order.
The objective is to complete as many challenges as possible.

name: word-search
description: Try to find as many words as possible related to a predetermined theme
details: A list of hidden words related to a given theme is given at the start of the game.
You can consult the list of hidden words and obtain get clues for help
The objective is to complete as many of the items as possible in a given timeframe.
There is no time-limit to place a tile

name: sprint
description: A target is given at the start of the game, the objective is to reach it in as little time as possible
details: Play as long as you need, but the quicker you can achieve the target number of points or (words), the better your score will be.
There is no time-limit to place a tile, but you will want to hurry!

name: arcade
description: Unlimited time is given, the objective is to score the highest amount of time and climb as many levels as possible!
details: You can play as long as you want, so long as you can survive!
There is a time-limit to each move, after which a tile will be removed if you cannot play within the time given
The game ends when you have no more space to move.
You will climb levels as you advance in the game, causing the game to get harder and harder...
The end goal is to score as many points as possible, and reach the highest level possible.
